comment:
* Defines the ranging request to other devices. The ranging request is built using * {@link RangingRequest.Builder}. * A ranging request is executed using * {@link WifiRttManager#startRanging(RangingRequest, java.util.concurrent.Executor, RangingResultCallback)}. *

* The ranging request is a batch request - specifying a set of devices (specified using * {@link RangingRequest.Builder#addAccessPoint(ScanResult)} and * {@link RangingRequest.Builder#addAccessPoints(List)}).

variables.name: mVendorData
variables.comment: * List of {@link OuiKeyedData} providing vendor-specific configuration data.

methods.name: public static int getMaxPeers()
methods.comment:
* Returns the maximum number of peers to range which can be specified in a single {@code
     * RangingRequest}. The limit applies no matter how the peers are added to the request, e.g.
     * through {@link RangingRequest.Builder#addAccessPoint(ScanResult)} or
     * {@link RangingRequest.Builder#addAccessPoints(List)}.
     *
     * @return Maximum number of peers.

methods.name: public static int getDefaultRttBurstSize()
methods.comment:
* Returns the default RTT burst size used to determine the average range.
     *
     * @return the RTT burst size used by default

methods.name: public static int getMinRttBurstSize()
methods.comment:
* Returns the minimum RTT burst size that can be used to determine a average range.
     *
     * @return the minimum RTT burst size that can be used

methods.name: public static int getMaxRttBurstSize()
methods.comment:
* Returns the minimum RTT burst size that can be used to determine a average range.
     *
     * @return the maximum RTT burst size that can be used

methods.name: public List<ResponderConfig> getRttResponders()
methods.comment:
* Returns the list of RTT capable responding peers.
     *
     * @return the list of RTT capable responding peers in a common system representation
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public int getRttBurstSize()
methods.comment:
* Returns the RTT burst size used to determine the average range.
     *
     * @return the RTT burst size used

methods.name: public List<OuiKeyedData> getVendorData()
methods.comment:
* Return the vendor-provided configuration data, if it exists. See also {@link
     * Builder#setVendorData(List)}
     *
     * @return Vendor configuration data, or empty list if it does not exist.
     * @hide

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel dest, int flags)
